document_data.mainbody:
Pain Street was a small road located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the mid-14 century DR.
Pain Street begun and ended on Cobble Road, turning along its midpoint to reconnect with the larger road. Pain Street was located in west Zhentil Keep in the Common Quarter. Fire Way connected with the eastern arm of Pain Street.
The most prominent buildings found along Pain Street were the Tower of Pain Exalted, a temple to Loviatar, and the Whipwalkers Cloak, a tavern that mostly catered to Loviatars faithful.
